101006.name: Leader
101006.description: Be the first one to reach Lv. 45 on your server

105009.name: Impossibly Lucky
105009.description: Obtain 3 SSR Relics in one go.

109001.name: Broke
109001.description: Spend all the gold from your backpack.

203001.name: Hobbyist
203001.description: Spend 100 minutes on one single game session.

203002.name: Hardcore Wanderer
203002.description: Spend 500 minutes on one single game session.

203003.name: Shhhhh
203003.description: Get caught 10 times while investigating furniture.

203006.name: Skilled Pioneer
203006.description: Spend 300 minutes on one single game session.

203007.name: Expert Pioneer
203007.description: Spend 800 minutes on one single game session.

203008.name: Master Pioneer
203008.description: Spend 1,000 minutes on one single game session.

203009.name: Encyclopedia
203009.description: Get a full mark on the Quiz for 3 days in a row.

203026.name: Vantage Point
203026.description: Get to the highest point of the tutorial region.

203027.name: Above the World
203027.description: Get to the highest point of the shelter region.

203029.name: Mesmerizing Oceanic Fantasy
203029.description: Research the Secret Pool Measurements 1 time.

203037.name: Drifting With the Waves
203037.description: Drift with the current over 10 kilometers.

203038.name: Downstream
203038.description: Drift with the current over 40 kilometers.

203039.name: Riding the Waves
203039.description: Drift with the current over 70 kilometers.

203041.name: Fishing by the Sea
203041.description: Catch 100 fish in the Grand Sea.

303002.name: Hey you made it!
303002.description: Hang on for 10 seconds in a combat with your HP less than 1%.

303003.name: More than I can handle
303003.description: Take so much damage that it's beyond your Max HP.

303004.name: Hero Sniper
303004.description: Kill a target from at least 150 meters away with a headshot by using a bow.

303007.name: Shut Up
303007.description: Keep the target silent for 10 seconds.

303008.name: Show Time
303008.description: Trigger Phantasia for a total of 10 minutes.

303009.name: Never Say Never
303009.description: Get defeated by the Sandworm 10 times.

303010.name: Death Rush
303010.description:
Clear
Deepsea Proving Ground on difficulty 03
under 8 minutes with teammates' HP no less than 20%.
